short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get call details of a web app, e.g. the API (OData) that is being used.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web App Call Details is a Chrome extension designed to facilitate the tracking and analysis of HTTP requests made by web applications. It provides an interface to view real-time network activity, including HTTP GET and POST requests, within the browser.

Features:
Monitor HTTP Requests: Real-time tracking of GET and POST requests, including those within batch calls.
URL Filtering: Ability to specify a list of URLs to be included or excluded from monitoring.
Templates: Functionality to load predefined or user-saved templates for various web applications.
Save & Load Configurations: Option to save the current configuration as a template and load it as needed.
User Interface: Simple and direct interface to facilitate easy navigation and usage.


Web App Call Details is intended for developers, testers, and other IT professionals who require a simple tool to monitor the network behavior of their web applications, assist in debugging, and test new features.

Please note, the extension does not capture or store any user browsing activity. It only monitors the requests made by the active tab where it is enabled, maintaining user privacy and data security.
